wikipedia_page.main:
Alexander Nikolaevich Gorban (Russian: Александр Николаевич Горба́нь)  is a scientist of Russian origin, working in the United Kingdom. He is a professor at the University of Leicester, and director of its
Mathematical Modeling Centre. Gorban has contributed to many areas of fundamental and applied science, including statistical physics, non-equilibrium thermodynamics, machine learning and mathematical biology.
Gorban is the author of about 20 books and 300 scientific publications. He has founded several scientific schools in the areas of physical and chemical kinetics, dynamical systems theory and artificial neural networks, and is ranked as one of the 1000 most cited researchers of Russian origin.Gorban has supervised 6 habilitations and more than 30 PhD theses.
